snippet.title: SEGA Vintage Collection: Streets of Rage (XBLA) - Xbox 360 Gameplay
snippet.description:
Captured off the Xbox One. 

This Xbox Live Arcade compilation brings together the original Streets of Rage trilogy on the Mega Drive. This 360 release includes the ability to switch between the English and Japanese versions, achievements (200G) and save states. And of course, it's backward compatible on the Xbox One and Series X|S.

SEGA Vintage Collection, Streets of Rage (C) SEGA
Developed by M2
Also released as individual titles on PlayStation 3 (PSN)

#xbla #xboxlivearcade #xbox360 #retrogames #retrogaming #sega #xboxgaming #xbox360games #xbox360gameplay #backwardcompatibility #xboxone #xbox #xboxseriess #xboxseriesx #theforeseenarcade #segavintagecollection #streetsofrage #streetsofrage3 #streetsofrage2

FUN FACT: There was originally a standalone XBLA release of Streets of Rage 2 by Backbone Entertainment, until it was delisted in favor of this collection.
